scripts.ready: pnpm fix && pnpm typecheck && pnpm test
scripts.ready:check: pnpm lint && pnpm typecheck && pnpm test
scripts.version:patch: pnpm -r exec npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && npm version patch --no-git-tag-version
scripts.version:minor: pnpm -r exec npm version minor --no-git-tag-version && npm version minor --no-git-tag-version
scripts.version:major: pnpm -r exec npm version major --no-git-tag-version && npm version major --no-git-tag-version
